TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit DateTimePicker extends System.Windows.Forms.Control

summary.span: 表示 Windows 控制項，這個控制項允許使用者選取日期和時間，並使用指定的格式來顯示日期和時間。

span.span: Represents a Windows control that allows the user to select a date and a time and to display the date and time with a specified format.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 控制項用來允許使用者選取日期和時間，並顯示該日期與時間中指定的格式。The control is used to allow the user to select a date and time, and to display that date and time in the specified format. 控制項可讓您輕鬆地使用日期和時間，因為它會自動處理大量的資料驗證。The control makes it easy to work with dates and times because it handles a lot of the data validation automatically. > [!NOTE] > 控制項僅支援西曆。The control only supports Gregorian calendars. 當用來代表日期，控制項出現在兩個部分： 下拉式清單，以表示文字，並按一下清單旁邊的向下箭號時，會出現日曆日期。When used to represent a date, the control appears in two parts: a drop-down list with a date represented in text, and a calendar that appears when you click the down-arrow next to the list. 行事曆看起來像控制項，可用來選取多個日期。The calendar looks like the control, which can be used for selecting multiple dates. 如需有關控制，請參閱[MonthCalendar 控制項概觀](~/docs/framework/winforms/controls/monthcalendar-control-overview-windows-forms.md)。For more information about the control, see [MonthCalendar Control Overview](~/docs/framework/winforms/controls/monthcalendar-control-overview-windows-forms.md). 您可以變更尋找 控制項的行事曆部分的設定， ， ， ， ，和屬性。You can change the look of the calendar portion of the control by setting the , , , , , and properties. 若要調整日期/時間值中使用微調按鈕控制項 （也稱為上下按鈕控制項），設定屬性`true`。To use a spin button control (also known as an up-down control) to adjust the date/time value, set the property to `true`. 選取控制項時，則日曆不將下拉式清單。The calendar will not drop down when the control is selected. 您可以調整日期和時間，個別選取每個項目，然後使用向上和向下鍵按鈕，變更值。The date and time can be adjusted by selecting each element individually and using the up and down buttons to change the value. 屬性包含目前的日期和時間控制項設定。The property contains the current date and time the control is set to. 您可以使用屬性或的適當成員取得日期和時間值。You can use the property or the appropriate member of to get the date and time value. 如需詳細資訊，請參閱[How to： 設定和傳回日期搭配 Windows Form DateTimePicker 控制項](~/docs/framework/winforms/controls/how-to-set-and-return-dates-with-the-windows-forms-datetimepicker-control.md)。For more information, see [How to: Set and Return Dates with the Windows Forms DateTimePicker Control](~/docs/framework/winforms/controls/how-to-set-and-return-dates-with-the-windows-forms-datetimepicker-control.md). 您可以限制日期和時間可以藉由設定選取和屬性。You can limit the dates and times that can be selected by setting the and properties. 值可以顯示四種格式，這是由在屬性： ， ， ，或。The values can be displayed in four formats, which are set by the property: , , , or . 預設日期是。The default date is . 如果您想顯示為挑選，或編輯而不是日期時間的控制項，設定屬性`true`和屬性。If you want the to appear as a control for picking or editing times instead of dates, set the property to `true` and the property to . 如需詳細資訊，請參閱[How to： 使用 DateTimePicker 控制項顯示時間](~/docs/framework/winforms/controls/how-to-display-time-with-the-datetimepicker-control.md)。For more information, see [How to: Display Time with the DateTimePicker Control](~/docs/framework/winforms/controls/how-to-display-time-with-the-datetimepicker-control.md). 如果屬性設定為，您可以建立您自己的格式樣式，藉由設定屬性及建立自訂格式字串。If the property is set to , you can create your own format style by setting the property and building a custom format string. 自訂格式字串可以是自訂欄位的字元和其他常值字元的組合。The custom format string can be a combination of custom field characters and other literal characters. 比方說，您可以藉由設定顯示為 「 年 6 月 01，2012年-星期五 」 的日期"MMMM dd，yyyy-dddd"的屬性。For example, you can display the date as "June 01, 2012 - Friday" by setting the property to "MMMM dd, yyyy - dddd". 如需詳細資訊，請參閱[How to： 使用 Windows Form DateTimePicker 控制項的自訂格式來顯示日期](~/docs/framework/winforms/controls/display-a-date-in-a-custom-format-with-wf-datetimepicker-control.md)和[自訂日期和時間格式字串](~/docs/standard/base-types/custom-date-and-time-format-strings.md)。For more information, see [How to: Display a Date in a Custom Format with the Windows Forms DateTimePicker Control](~/docs/framework/winforms/controls/display-a-date-in-a-custom-format-with-wf-datetimepicker-control.md) and [Custom Date and Time Format Strings](~/docs/standard/base-types/custom-date-and-time-format-strings.md). > [!CAUTION] > 當是資料繫結和備份值變更為`null`，值將不會更新，並將保留先前的值。When a is data-bound and the backing value is changed to `null`, the value of the will not be updated and the previous value will be retained. 在其中此行為不需要這樣做 （例如，當使用一組資料繫結控制項分頁的資料錄集） 的情況下使用事件類別來設定值辨識為`null`。In situations where this behavior is not desirable (for example, when using a set of data-bound controls to page through a recordset) use the event of the class to set the to a value recognizable as a `null`. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例會建立新的執行個體控制，並將它初始化。The following code example creates an new instance of a control and initializes it. 控制項的屬性設定。The control's property is set. 此外，屬性設定，讓控制項顯示，而屬性設定，讓控制項顯示為微調按鈕控制項。Also, the property is set so that the control displays a , and the property is set so that the control is displayed as a spin button control. 若要執行此範例中，將下列程式碼貼到表單，並呼叫`CreateMyDateTimePicker`範例表單的建構函式中的方法或事件處理方法。To run this example, paste the following code into a form and call the `CreateMyDateTimePicker` method in the example form’s constructor or event handling method. span.span: A that represents the font style applied to the calendar.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 從開始使用 Windows Vista，並根據佈景主題，設定這個屬性可能不會變更行事曆外觀。Starting with Windows Vista and depending on the theme, setting this property might not change the appearance of the calendar. 例如，如果您可以設定 Windows 使用 Aero 的佈景主題，設定此屬性沒有任何作用。For example, if Windows is set to use the Aero theme, setting this property has no effect. 這是因為在執行階段衍生自目前作業系統的佈景主題的外觀呈現行事曆的更新的版本。This is because an updated version of the calendar is rendered with an appearance that is derived at run time from the current operating system theme. 如果您想要使用這個屬性並啟用行事曆的舊版，您可以停用您的應用程式視覺化樣式。If you want to use this property and enable the earlier version of the calendar, you can disable visual styles for your application. 停用視覺化樣式，可能會影響的外觀和行為的應用程式中其他控制項。Disabling visual styles might affect the appearance and behavior of other controls in your application. 若要停用在 Visual Basic 中的視覺化樣式，請開啟 專案設計工具並取消核取**啟用 XP 視覺化樣式**核取方塊。To disable visual styles in Visual Basic, open the Project Designer and uncheck the **Enable XP visual styles** check box. 若要停用 C# 中的視覺化樣式，請開啟 Program.cs 並標記為註解`Application.EnableVisualStyles();`。To disable visual styles in C#, open Program.cs and comment out `Application.EnableVisualStyles();`. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範如何初始化屬性。The following code example demonstrates how to initialize the property. 這個範例會建立新控制項，將它加入至集合，並再初始化屬性，以動態定義。This example creates a new control, adds it to the collection of a , and then initializes the property to a dynamically defined . [!code-cpp[DateTimePicker.CalendarFont#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/DateTimePicker.CalendarFont/CPP/calendarfont.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[DateTimePicker.CalendarFont#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/DateTimePicker.CalendarFont/CS/calendarfont.cs#1)] [!code-vb[DateTimePicker.CalendarFont#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/DateTimePicker.CalendarFont/VB/calendarfont.vb#1)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks 當已建立，這個屬性一開始設為等於欄位值。When a is created, this property is initially set equal to the field value. 尾隨日期是從上個月的結束日期或下個月用來填滿日曆的開始日期。The trailing dates are the ending dates from the previous month or the beginning dates from the next month used to fill the calendar. 從開始使用 Windows Vista，並根據佈景主題，設定這個屬性可能不會變更行事曆外觀。Starting with Windows Vista and depending on the theme, setting this property might not change the appearance of the calendar. 例如，如果您可以設定 Windows 使用 Aero 的佈景主題，設定此屬性沒有任何作用。For example, if Windows is set to use the Aero theme, setting this property has no effect. 這是因為在執行階段衍生自目前作業系統的佈景主題的外觀呈現行事曆的更新的版本。This is because an updated version of the calendar is rendered with an appearance that is derived at run time from the current operating system theme. 如果您想要使用這個屬性並啟用行事曆的舊版，您可以停用您的應用程式視覺化樣式。If you want to use this property and enable the earlier version of the calendar, you can disable visual styles for your application. 停用視覺化樣式，可能會影響的外觀和行為的應用程式中其他控制項。Disabling visual styles might affect the appearance and behavior of other controls in your application. 若要停用在 Visual Basic 中的視覺化樣式，請開啟 專案設計工具並取消核取**啟用 XP 視覺化樣式**核取方塊。To disable visual styles in Visual Basic, open the Project Designer and uncheck the **Enable XP visual styles** check box. 若要停用 C# 中的視覺化樣式，請開啟 Program.cs 並標記為註解`Application.EnableVisualStyles();`。To disable visual styles in C#, open Program.cs and comment out `Application.EnableVisualStyles();`.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 這個屬性用來取得狀態的核取方塊時，系統會顯示屬性值是`true`。This property is used to obtain the state of the check box that is displayed if the property value is `true`. 如果屬性值是`true`、控制項會顯示適當格式化屬性值; 否則控制項就會顯示最後一個有效的日期/時間值指派給屬性或目前的日期和時間 () 如果已經被不指派任何值。If the property value is `true`, the control displays the properly formatted property value; otherwise, the control displays the last valid date/time value assigned to the property or the current date and time () if no value has ever been assigned.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 若要顯示包含日期和時間分隔符號的字串常值或字串的格式，您必須使用子字串中的逸出字元。To display string literals that contain date and time separators or to format strings, you must use escape characters in the substring. 例如，若要顯示為"年 6 月 15 下午 12:00"的日期，設定"MMMM dd 'at' t:mm tt"的屬性。For example, to display the date as "June 15 at 12:00 PM", set the property to "MMMM dd 'at' t:mm tt". 如果逸出字元不以"at"子字串，則結果是 「 年 6 月 15 aP 12:00 PM"因為當做單一字母 a.m./p.m.讀取"t"字元。If the "at" substring is not enclosed by escape characters, the result is "June 15 aP 12:00PM" because the "t" character is read as the one-letter A.M./P.M. 格式字串 （請參閱以下的格式字串資料表）。format string (see the format string table below). 格式字串可以結合以格式化的日期和時間。The format strings can be combined to format the date and time. 例如，若要顯示的日期和時間為 06/15/2001年 12:00 PM，這個屬性應該設定為 「 MM '/' dd '/' yyyy hh': ' mm tt"。For example, to display the date and time as 06/15/2001 12:00 PM, this property should be set to "MM'/'dd'/'yyyy hh':'mm tt". 如需詳細資訊，請參閱[自訂日期和時間格式字串](~/docs/standard/base-types/custom-date-and-time-format-strings.md)。For more information, see [Custom Date and Time Format Strings](~/docs/standard/base-types/custom-date-and-time-format-strings.md). > [!NOTE] > 屬性必須設定為為此屬性會影響顯示的日期和時間格式。The property must be set to for this property to affect the formatting of the displayed date and time. 下表列出所有有效的格式字串和其說明。The following table lists all the valid format strings and their descriptions. |格式化字串Format string|描述Description| |-------------------|-----------------| |dd|一個或兩位數的日期。The one- or two-digit day.| |dddd|兩位數的日期。The two-digit day. 單一位數的日期值前面都為 0。Single-digit day values are preceded by a 0.| |dddddd|三個字元的週中日縮寫。The three-character day-of-week abbreviation.| |dddddddd|完整的星期名稱。The full day-of-week name.| |hh|一個或兩個位數的小時，12 小時制的小時。The one- or two-digit hour in 12-hour format.| |hhhh|兩位數的小時，12 小時制的小時。The two-digit hour in 12-hour format. 0 個前面有單一數字值。Single digit values are preceded by a 0.| |HH|一個或兩個位數的小時，24 小時制的小時。The one- or two-digit hour in 24-hour format.| |HHHH|兩位數的小時，24 小時制的小時。The two-digit hour in 24-hour format. 0 個前面有單一數字值。Single digit values are preceded by a 0.| |mm|一個或兩位數分鐘。The one- or two-digit minute.| |mmmm|兩位數分鐘。The two-digit minute. 0 個前面有單一數字值。Single digit values are preceded by a 0.| |MM|一個或兩位數月份數。The one- or two-digit month number.| |MMMM|兩位數月份數。The two-digit month number. 0 個前面有單一數字值。Single digit values are preceded by a 0.| |MMMMMM|三個字元的月份縮寫。The three-character month abbreviation.| |MMMMMMMM|完整月份名稱。The full month name.| |秒s|一個或兩位數的秒數。The one- or two-digit seconds.| |ssss|兩位數的秒數。The two-digit seconds. 0 個前面有單一數字值。Single digit values are preceded by a 0.| |tt|單一字母 a.m./p.m.中。The one-letter A.M./P.M. 縮寫 （上午abbreviation (A.M. 會顯示為"A"）。is displayed as "A").| |tttt|兩個字母 a.m./p.m.中。The two-letter A.M./P.M. 縮寫 （上午abbreviation (A.M. 會顯示為"AM"）。is displayed as "AM").| |yy|（顯示為"1"2001年） 的一位數年份。The one-digit year (2001 is displayed as "1").| |yyyy|兩位數的年份 （顯示為"01"2001年）。The last two digits of the year (2001 is displayed as "01").| |yyyyyyyy|完整的年份 （顯示為"2001"2001年）。The full year (2001 is displayed as "2001").| ## Examples 下列程式碼範例會設定屬性以便將會顯示為 「 年 6 月 01，2001年-星期五 」 日期。The following code example sets the property so that the will display the date as "June 01, 2001 - Friday". 此程式碼會假設執行個體已經建立控制項上。This code assumes that an instance of a control has been created on a . remarks.format: ## Remarks 當屬性設定為`true`、 微調按鈕控制項 （也稱為上下按鈕控制項），而不是下拉式行事曆，來調整時間值。When the property is set to `true`, a spin button control (also known as an up-down control), rather than a drop-down calendar, is used to adjust time values. 您可以調整日期和時間，個別選取每個項目，然後使用向上和向下鍵按鈕，變更值。The date and time can be adjusted by selecting each element individually and using the up and down buttons to change the value. 若要顯示中的唯一時間，將屬性，而屬性`true`。To display only time in a , set the property to , and the property to `true`. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例會建立新的執行個體控制，並將它初始化。The following code example creates an new instance of a control and initializes it. 控制項的屬性設定。The control's property is set. 此外，屬性設定，讓控制項顯示，而屬性設定，讓控制項顯示為微調按鈕控制項。Also, the property is set so that the control displays a , and the property is set so that the control is displayed as a spin button control. remarks.format: ## Remarks 這個屬性所傳回的字串相當於屬性與適當的格式設定或套用自訂格式。The string returned by this property is equivalent to the property with the appropriate formatting or custom formatting applied. 例如，如果屬性設定為 06/01/2001年 12:00:00 時屬性設定為"dddd，MMMM dd，yyyy"屬性值為"Friday，年 6 月 01，2001 」。For example, if the property is set to 06/01/2001 12:00:00 AM while the property is set to "dddd, MMMM dd, yyyy", the property value is "Friday, June 01, 2001". 設定此屬性時，字串必須可轉換為的執行個體類別。When setting this property, the string must be convertible to an instance of the class. 您可透過定義自訂格式，導致無法轉換成有效的字串值。It is possible to define a custom format that results in a string that cannot be converted to a valid value. 因為這個緣故，傳回從字串屬性可能會導致錯誤，如果傳遞回屬性。Because of this, the string returned from the property might cause an error if it is passed back to the property. 如果字串無法轉換成日期/時間值，類別會擲回。If the string cannot be converted to a date/time value, the class throws a .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果屬性未變更程式碼或使用者，則會設定為目前的日期和時間 ()。If the property has not been changed in code or by the user, it is set to the current date and time (). ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範如何使用屬性，以擷取目前的日期值。The following code example demonstrates how use the property to retrieve the current date value. 首先，此範例會顯示屬性。First, the example displays the property. 接著，此範例為增量單位屬性，方法是一天，並顯示屬性值，一次。The example then increments the property by one day and displays the property value again. remarks.format: ## Remarks 驗證使用者輸入之前會引發這個事件。User input is validated before this event is raised. 輸入的日期早於時，不會引發這個事件或更晚。This event is not raised when the entered date is earlier than or later than . 如需處理事件的詳細資訊，請參閱[處理和引發事件](~/docs/standard/events/index.md)。For more information about handling events, see [Handling and Raising Events](~/docs/standard/events/index.md). ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範如何使用這個成員。The following code example demonstrates the use of this member. 在範例中，事件處理常式會報告一次事件。In the example, an event handler reports on the occurrence of the event. 此報表可協助您了解事件發生的時機，並可協助您偵錯。This report helps you to learn when the event occurs and can assist you in debugging. 若要報告多個事件或事件經常發生，請考慮更換與或將訊息附加到多行。To report on multiple events or on events that occur frequently, consider replacing with or appending the message to a multiline . 若要執行範例程式碼，將它貼到包含類型的執行個體的專案名為`DateTimePicker1`。To run the example code, paste it into a project that contains an instance of type named `DateTimePicker1`. 請確定事件處理常式關聯事件。Then ensure that the event handler is associated with the event.
